remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Remaining probe heater indicating systems for operative probe heaters are operative, and
Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.
No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.
Thrust Management System will be unavailable.

note.para: When the TAT heater system is inoperative, the TMC considers the temperature from TAT to be invalid and disconnects Autothrottle.

numlitem.para: Downgrade aircraft dispatch category status to CAT 1.
Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard TAT Light on Overhead Panel “HEAT INOP” and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
